com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.ble

类 AylaBLEDeviceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.localdevice.ble.AylaBLEDeviceManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AylaLocalDeviceManager, AylaPlugin, DeviceClassPlugin, DeviceListPlugin

    public class AylaBLEDeviceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AylaLocalDeviceManager, DeviceListPlugin
    The AylaBLEDeviceManager implements the AylaLocalDeviceManager and DeviceListPlugin interfaces to provide local device support for BLE devices.

      static class  AylaBLEDeviceManager.ServiceScanFilter

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AylaBLEDeviceManager

        public AylaBLEDeviceManager(android.content.Context context,
                            java.util.UUID[] scanServices)
        AylaBLEDeviceManager constructor.
        参数:
        context - Context for the application
        scanServices - Array of service UUIDs the manager should use when scanning for local devices. Each supported device must export a UUID from this array in order to be discovered and automatically connect.

    • 方法详细资料

      • findLocalDevices

        public AylaAPIRequest findLocalDevices(int timeoutInMs,
                                       com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaLocalDevice[]> successListener,
                                       ErrorListener errorListener)
        Finds local BLE devices which advertise a service ID specified in the array of serviceUUIDs used to initialize the AylaBLEDeviceManager
        参数:
        timeoutInMs - Timeout for discovery in ms
        successListener - Listener to receive the results of the scan
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the request

      • findLocalDevices

        public AylaAPIRequest findLocalDevices(java.lang.Object hint,
                                       int timeoutInMs,
                                       com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaLocalDevice[]> successListener,
                                       ErrorListener errorListener)
        The AylaBLEDeviceManager's implementation of this uses a AylaBLEDeviceManager.ScanFilter object as the hint when doing a scan.
        指定者:
        findLocalDevices 在接口中 AylaLocalDeviceManager
        参数:
        hint - Search-specific hint used to filter the set of returned devices. The format of this object is not defined, but may be used by subclasses to filter based on Bluetooth address ranges, GATT service IDs, etc.
        timeoutInMs - Maximum time the search should take in ms
        successListener - Listener to be notified with the results
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • findBLEDevices

        public AylaAPIRequest findBLEDevices(AylaBLEDeviceManager.ScanFilter scanFilter,
                                     int timeoutInMs,
                                     com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaBLESetupDevice[]> successListener,
                                     ErrorListener errorListener)
        Finds BLE devices which advertise the service IDs specified in scanFilter parameter.
        参数:
        scanFilter - used to filter the set of returned devices.
        timeoutInMs - Maximum time the search should take in ms.
        successListener - Listener to be notified with the results.
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur.
        返回:
        a cancelable AylaAPIRequest

      • registerLocalDevice

        public AylaAPIRequest registerLocalDevice(AylaSessionManager sessionManager,
                                          AylaLocalDevice localDevice,
                                          java.lang.String oem,
                                          com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaLocalDevice> successListener,
                                          ErrorListener errorListener)
        从接口复制的说明: AylaLocalDeviceManager
        Registers a local device with the Ayla service. Devices are unregistered via a call to the device object's AylaLocalDevice.unregister(Response.Listener, ErrorListener) method.
        指定者:
        registerLocalDevice 在接口中 AylaLocalDeviceManager
        参数:
        sessionManager - Session manager for the account this device should be registered to
        localDevice - Device to register. This should have been returned from findLocalDevices.
        oem - OEM ID for the account. This may be null if only one OEM exists for the signed-in account.
        successListener - Listener to receive the registered device upon success
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest, which may be used to cancel the operation

      • getDeviceClass

        public java.lang.Class<? extends AylaDevice> getDeviceClass(java.lang.String model,
                                                            java.lang.String oemModel,
                                                            java.lang.String uniqueId)
        从接口复制的说明: DeviceClassPlugin
        Returns the AylaDevice-derived class for a given model, oemModel and unique identifier. These fields are obtained from device JSON and passed to this method. The method should return the appropriate class to create given the supplied parameters. These parameters may be null if the fields did not exist in the original JSON. If no matching class can be found, this method should return null to indicate it does not support devices with the given model, oemModel or unique ID. The AylaDeviceManager depends on this method returning the appropriate class type so that local devices may be constructed properly. A plugin implementing this interface should be installed with the plugin ID of AylaNetworks.PLUGIN_ID_DEVICE_CLASS.
        指定者:
        getDeviceClass 在接口中 DeviceClassPlugin
        参数:
        model - Model of the device
        oemModel - OEM model of the device
        uniqueId - Unique identifier for this device
        返回:
        an AylaDevice-derived class object which will be used to construct this device object.

      • updateDeviceMap

        public void updateDeviceMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AylaDevice> deviceMap)
        从接口复制的说明: DeviceListPlugin
        Called by the AylaDeviceManager after merging the list of devices from the Ayla cloud service. The provided map is the same map used by AylaDeviceManager for device management. Implementers may update or modify the master device map in this method.
        指定者:
        updateDeviceMap 在接口中 DeviceListPlugin
